SELECT EDU_SMN_ID AS 'eduId' /*교육세미나ID*/ ,TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ ,EDU_PL_SCN_CD AS 'eduPlScnCd' /*교육장소코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('EDU_PL_SCN_CD', A.EDU_PL_SCN_CD) AS 'eduPlScnNm' /*교육장소이름*/ ,EDU_INST_NM AS 'eduInstNm' /*교육기관,강사명*/ ,EDU_STRT_DT AS 'eduStrtDt' /*교육시작일*/ ,EDU_FNH_DT AS 'eduFnhDt' /*교육종료일*/ ,SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,(CASE WHEN (select count(1) from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FILE_ID and DEL_YN = 'N') = 0 THEN NULL ELSE A.ATTC_FILE_ID END) AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자이름*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,convert(varchar(20),A.FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM IRIS_KNLD_EDU_SMN A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITL_NM like '%${titlNm}%'
AND dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) like '%${rgstNm}%'
AND EDU_PL_SCN_CD = '${eduPlScnCd}'
AND EDU_STRT_DT >= #{eduStrtDt}
AND EDU_STRT_DT <= #{eduFnhDt}
ORDER BY EDU_SMN_ID DESC

SELECT EDU_SMN_ID AS 'eduId' /*교육세미나ID*/ ,TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ ,EDU_PL_SCN_CD AS 'eduPlScnCd' /*교육장소코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('EDU_PL_SCN_CD', A.EDU_PL_SCN_CD) AS 'eduPlScnNm' /*교육장소이름*/ ,EDU_INST_NM AS 'eduInstNm' /*교육기관,강사명*/ ,EDU_STRT_DT AS 'eduStrtDt' /*교육시작일*/ ,EDU_FNH_DT AS 'eduFnhDt' /*교육종료일*/ ,SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,ATTC_FILE_ID AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자이름*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,convert(varchar(20),A.FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM IRIS_KNLD_EDU_SMN A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND EDU_SMN_ID = #{eduId}
